response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product offers unparalleled value and functionality, tailored specifically to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings compared to its market value. We believe this investment will greatly benefit you and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
